channel.title: Small project consists of programs
channel.description:
[center][b]Wales 00's project[/b][/center]
After being on IRC for a few days and making a new modification for Taharok's forums I decided to create a little server in the mean time while I get bored. This project may not go through but I shall release the finished project if I get bored ect.
[center][b]Server information[/b][/center] I ain't going to make a server from scratch, it's just a waste of time and I wouldn't use it much at all, therefore I will be using something a little more advanced than the servers out there now, every person will get some sort of credit for my finished project and hopefully I can release a good server for people to use.
I will be hardcoding for some reasons; one is I really have no clue on how to do it any more, it has been so long since the last time I made a model and added to my server it's unbelievable, even though it's really easy to do I guess I can learn a few more things about client related things. I will not be adding any custom items, I will just be finding new ways on how to add models and other things and then advance off that.
I am not going to a goal on this project, there is a difference between goals and achievements therefore everything I add I will class it as a achievement.
[center][b]Pictures[/b][/center] I am not going to provide any pictures [b]yet[/b], the development is really early and I don't want to waste time taking screen shots of nothing.
[b]Programs[/b] I may or may not put any custom programs on this project, if I am bored and have nothing further to do with my time then I will start on a graphical user interface for some educational purposes (Using Visual basic).
[b]Comments[/b] Don't ask for pictures.

item.title: Small project consists of programs
item.dc:creator: @Fission Fission
item.description:
@Fission wrote:

Not much info, but, Good luck on your journey mate.

Read full topic

item.title: Small project consists of programs
item.dc:creator: @wales_00 wales 00
item.description:
@wales_00 wrote:

[center]Wales 00’s project[/center]

After being on IRC for a few days and making a new modification for Taharok’s forums I decided to create a little server in the mean time while I get bored. This project may not go through but I shall release the finished project if I get bored ect.

[center]Server information[/center]
I ain’t going to make a server from scratch, it’s just a waste of time and I wouldn’t use it much at all, therefore I will be using something a little more advanced than the servers out there now, every person will get some sort of credit for my finished project and hopefully I can release a good server for people to use.

I will be hardcoding for some reasons; one is I really have no clue on how to do it any more, it has been so long since the last time I made a model and added to my server it’s unbelievable, even though it’s really easy to do I guess I can learn a few more things about client related things. I will not be adding any custom items, I will just be finding new ways on how to add models and other things and then advance off that.

I am not going to a goal on this project, there is a difference between goals and achievements therefore everything I add I will class it as a achievement.

[center]Pictures[/center]
I am not going to provide any pictures yet, the development is really early and I don’t want to waste time taking screen shots of nothing.

Programs
I may or may not put any custom programs on this project, if I am bored and have nothing further to do with my time then I will start on a graphical user interface for some educational purposes (Using Visual basic).

Comments
Don’t ask for pictures.
